name: live_fantasy_score
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool fantasy_cricket.
Tool description: Most Accurate, Realtime, Fast and Reliable Fantasy Cricket API in the market. Any issues, queries, api integration, custom plan or to Create your own Fantasy Sports Application  contact us at support@techflinch.com 
API description: Real-time and Low-Latency Match Live Score API. Get the match score, Batting, bowling and fielding information for a specified match in real time
Any issues, queries, api integration, custom plan or to **Create your own Fantasy Sports Application**  contact us at support@techflinch.com

matchid.description: The identifier for the match to fetch live scores.
